update_plan.update_summary: Document the changes related to metadata addition and AI configuration in the Integrated Learning system, as well as the daily logs for tracking and analyzing progress.
key_changes: Addition of metadata to training summary file
Update in AI Integration Module configuration

specific_updates.README.md: Include information about the recent change that adds metadata to the training summary file, its impact on the project, and the reason behind this enhancement.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Update the section on Integrated Learning Configuration to reflect the changes in the AI Integration Module and Data Management.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Include the new metadata fields in the training summary file, such as total examples, categories, timestamps, and empty arrays for key patterns, frequent solutions, and recent activity.
